name: shareYTonFB
tagline: A bookmarklet to share an YouTube content on Facebook.
body:
### What is this?
This is a bookmarklet to share an YouTube content with a start time on Facebook.

This bookmarklet is based on [the Facebook's official bookmarklet](https://www.facebook.com/share_options.php) and customized to add a start time so that your friends can watch a particular scene of the YouTube content.

### How to use?
1. Drag and drop **this bookmarklet** to the toolbar in the browser
2. Go to the YouTube site and watch any content
3. Press the bookmarklet in the toolbar
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
